hotels.title: Japan Hakone Hot Spring Escape with Private Onsen Baths
hotels.description: Surrounded by majestic mountains and greenery, Hotel Indigo Hakone Gora, an IHG Hotel offers a contemporary and refined hot spring escape among the Japanese mountainside. Savour superb dishes featuring locally-sourced ingredients at Riverside Kitchen & Bar, or enjoy calming Hayakawa River views and a cold beer while soaking away tension in the outdoor Foot Bath and Cafe. Plus, indulge in soothing massage therapies and beauty treatments at The Spa by HARNN.
